47cf790641fdb9eae1f8b020d5b8353fb26eaecb: Canaanite city-states, trade circuits, and material culture in Palestine as groundwork for later continuity and rupture.
da896adc37e8775ef7d58a8c3b8c33bf0ed1f730: Urban exchange across the Levant consolidates city-states and maritime trade.
971aa1b0fe83e27c86a041fbf95a4e8d1451c6e2: Sustained Palestinian revolt against British colonial rule and Zionist settlement; crushed by massive British repression.
3f94b31f56e9eb4d6ad3152527dc8a8b277be678: Irgun and Lehi forces kill scores of Palestinian villagers; event accelerates flight and expulsions during the Nakba.
ed25713f1e9749ad34dfe7ff4a7c93d115c9b3e8: Mass expulsions under military orders; tens of thousands forced out in peak heat, many dying en route.
8007681e928192c7574bf1763e4b46bdfc296949: The Nakba — mass displacement and destruction
8ccf449af7601a3243437ab8fa80ddc2f5968385: Over 700,000 Palestinians expelled; 400+ villages depopulated or destroyed.
65dceaa78483bc0d7b69148e29a650b8f3759cbd: Occupation of the West Bank, Gaza, East Jerusalem
db763565057ad8eef5f505099f5fa107d7b23840: Israel’s military occupation begins; annexation of East Jerusalem and a long regime of settlements and military orders follow.
5f59e3a2b69ebab41cd5b491f83a36d79b10ad15: International Court of Justice finds the Wall/barrier and related regime contrary to international law; calls for dismantling and reparations.
